promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a gigantic mythical beetle dark-type with a purple cosmic crystal core. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or dark. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Virella, a gigantic mythical beetle dark-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: crunch. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word beetle or dark or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, beetle-like, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: Virella, the giant mythical cave dweller, lurks in shadows crunching foes with its powerful jaws.
